"Wish me luck." - Sergey

Hello again fellas!
The long-awaited WW2 related sight is here! This is my 4th usersight inspired by the Mosin Nagant's PU scope but with some details that'd make it fit to be an interesting War Thunder sight, like making the center pointer outlined for better visibility and with more range values for more accurate precision.

2 Bonus drawings of this sight include the Logo for the Russian Rock band Kino and their album cover for Группа крови (Gruppa Krovi) by the request of @Neco_Arc in my previous post. 😎😎
https://li...

it's my first time making a sight, hope y'all like it

This is so far my best made not p34 sight but I will take a break soon because I've not enough the sights with anime girls without clothes so sorry, as always the sight is handy I tried to hope you like it!

Made for Streamer: SteamySnuggler

I'm Currently Open for Custom Sights Commissions, If you are interested send request to chrono1774 on Discord or leave a comment.

#sight #alltanks #anime #steamysnuggler #wtdraw

Gday fellas
My newest sight is currently in the works, plus I'm doing a bit of grinding in war thunder. But for now, for all you default sight enjoyers, I've just modified the default short range sight with the horizontal lines removed, but now with the logos from my three previous sights.

Inside the file has the three blk files that you simply drop in the game folder --> usersights --> all_tanks
the WTdraw files are there for you to modify the position and scale of the three logos, then you simply export as a .txt file, copy inside of the txt file and paste the lines on the .blk ...
